title: [Large-scale] Mobile Microlearning-based e-Learning Material Development Process

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive science course in BYOD environments requiring formative assessment-based learning outcome measurement. Must be designed for accessible engagement by learners with beginner-level domain expertise

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core elements of the e-learning material development stages (needs analysis - storyboard creation - content production).
Learners can apply the necessary learning theories to design microlearning content suitable for mobile environments.
Learners can structure an ID team collaboration process (role distribution among instructional designers - subject matter experts - technologists) according to real-world scenarios.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
